name: Couch Repair
description:
Forget everything you know about fixing couches. Do what the customers want. Or don't. I don't care. Prepare to experience the most high-def couch-based gameplay that you've ever seen. 

Note - the webgl build seems to run really poorly on Chrome for me, but runs fine in Edge or Firefox. If performance seems bad, try another browser.

Instructions: You'll get a couch (probably) and a note from the customer on what they want. Fix things until you think that it's "correct" to your standards, and then see what the customer thinks. 

Controls:
Left-click to pan camera.
 Left-click to drag objects around
Double-left-click to inspect a disconnected cusion,
while inspecting, hold left click to rotate

This game was made in under 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020. Here's a link to the GGJ page for the game:
https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/couch-repair-9
